object_finder.description: Finds a specific map object by its ID and returns its coordinates.

pathfinder.description: A* pathfinding tool that finds the shortest path between two points. It handles one-way ledges and can now use HMs like SURF if they are provided, including handling transitions between land and water.

hms_available.description: Optional. Comma-separated list of HMs the player has, e.g., 'SURF,FLASH'

debug.description: Optional. Set to 'true' to enable debug logging.

warp_scanner.description: Scans the current map XML and returns the coordinates of all warp tiles that do not have a map marker.

puzzle_solver_step.description: Calculates the next single button press to solve the Ruins of Alph tile puzzle. It takes the current puzzle grid, target grid, cursor position, and whether a piece is being held, and returns the next single D-pad or 'A' button press.
